title: Civil Engineer – Site Supervision
summary: We are seeking a motivated Civil Engineering graduate to join our site supervision team, supporting project engineers on active construction sites across Lagos.
responsibilities: Assist in setting out and interpreting structural and architectural drawings
Calculate concrete volumes and estimate material requirements
Supervise daily site activities and enforce health & safety protocols
Maintain accurate site records, daily reports, and progress logs
Liaise with contractors, subcontractors, and project managers
requirements: B.Sc / B.Eng in Civil Engineering (minimum Second Class Lower)
0–2 years post-NYSC experience (fresh graduates encouraged to apply)
Basic proficiency in AutoCAD is an advantage
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work on-site in Lagos with physical stamina
benefits: Hands-on experience on high-value construction projects
Pathway to full-time placement with partner companies
howToApply: Send your CV and a one-page cover letter to info@era.com.ng with the subject line: Application – Civil Engineer Site Supervision

title: Mechanical Engineer – HVAC & Maintenance
summary: ERA is looking for a mechanical engineering professional with experience or strong interest in HVAC systems, plumbing installations, and mechanical maintenance for commercial and residential projects.
responsibilities: Design, install, and maintain HVAC and mechanical systems on project sites
Prepare technical reports and as-built documentation
Coordinate with civil and electrical teams on project integration
Troubleshoot mechanical failures and propose cost-effective solutions
Ensure all mechanical work complies with relevant Nigerian standards
requirements: B.Eng / B.Sc in Mechanical Engineering
1–3 years of relevant industry experience preferred
Familiarity with HVAC systems, pumps, and piping layouts
Proficiency in technical drawing interpretation
Good communication and teamwork skills
benefits: Exposure to diverse project types across residential and commercial sectors
Pathway to ERA partner company placement
howToApply: Send your CV to info@era.com.ng with subject: Application – Mechanical Engineer HVAC

title: Electrical Engineer – Building Services
summary: We are recruiting an Electrical Engineering graduate to support our building services team, focusing on electrical installation design, site supervision, and commissioning for ongoing construction projects.
responsibilities: Prepare and review electrical drawings, single-line diagrams, and panel schedules
Supervise electrical installations including wiring, lighting, and power distribution
Conduct site inspections and ensure compliance with electrical codes and standards
Liaise with project managers and other engineering disciplines on-site
Assist in commissioning, testing, and handover of electrical systems
requirements: B.Eng / B.Sc in Electrical Engineering or Electrical & Electronics Engineering
0–2 years post-NYSC experience
Basic knowledge of AutoCAD Electrical or similar tools is an advantage
Understanding of Nigerian Electrical Code (NEC) and IET Wiring Regulations
Strong attention to detail and ability to work to project deadlines
benefits: On-the-job training on active construction projects
Direct pathway to employment with ERA partner companies
howToApply: Email info@era.com.ng with subject: Application – Electrical Engineer Building Services

title: Project Manager – Building & Construction
summary: ERA is seeking an experienced Project Manager to oversee building and construction projects from inception to completion, managing timelines, budgets, contractors, and client relationships.
responsibilities: Lead end-to-end project delivery across residential and commercial construction projects
Develop and maintain project schedules, budgets, and risk registers
Manage relationships with clients, contractors, consultants, and statutory bodies
Conduct regular site visits and produce detailed progress reports
Ensure all projects meet quality, safety, and regulatory requirements
Mentor junior engineers and site staff
requirements: B.Sc / B.Eng in Civil, Structural, or Building Engineering (PMP or PRINCE2 certification is an advantage)
3–5 years of verifiable project management experience in building construction
Demonstrated ability to manage multiple concurrent projects
Proficiency in MS Project, Primavera, or similar scheduling tools
Strong leadership, negotiation, and stakeholder management skills
benefits: Leadership role on high-profile Lagos construction projects
Opportunity to build a team and shape ERA's project delivery standards
Access to ERA's growing network of partner companies and clients
howToApply: Submit your CV and a portfolio of completed projects to info@era.com.ng with subject: Application – Project Manager Building
